document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Size </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">circumscribes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">room </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">petty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">furniture </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Giant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">tolerates </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Gnat </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Ease </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Gianture </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Repudiates </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">intrinsic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">size </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Ignores </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">possibility </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Calumnies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Flies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Size circumscribes - it has no room
